General.Name: CFECAPITAL S. De R.L. De C.V
General.Description: CFECAPITAL, S. De R.L. De C.V. operates as a trust for investment in energy and infrastructure in Mexico. It focuses on acquiring and owning electric power transmission, generation, and distribution assets. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Avenida Paseo de las Palmas nu, Mexico City, Mexico, 11000
